question.content: Reinforcement Learning (RL) nima?
Reinforcement Learning qanday muammolar bilan shug’ ullanadi?
Reinforcement Learning qanday maqsadlar uchun qo’ llaniladi?
Reinforcement Learningda qanday tizimlar (systems) yaratiladi?
Qanday holatlarda Reinforcement Learning qulay?
Agent, Environment va Action qanday Reinforcement Learning tizimining asosiy qismlari?
Reinforcement Learning uchun asosiy algoritmlar qaysilar?
Reward, Policy va Value Functions Reinforcement Learning-da qanday ahamiyatga ega?
Reinforcement Learningning Machine Learning turidan farqi nima?
Reinforcement Learning (RL) va Supervised Learning (SL) orasidagi asosiy farq nima?
Qanday holatlarda Reinforcement Learning modelini qo’llash mumkin?
Bellman tenglamasi Reinforcement Learningda qanday qilib ishlatiladi?
Qanday holatlarda Reinforcement Learni algoritmlari robotexnika sohalarida foydalaniladi?
Reinforcement Learningda exploration va exploitation bu qanday muammolar?
Reinforcement Learningda Value iteration va Policy iteration algoritmlari qanday ishlaydi?
Qanday holatlarda Q-learning algoritmi foydalaniladi?
Reinforcement Learning uchun Tensorflow va PyTorch kabi dasturlash tillari qanday ishlatiladi?
Actor-Critic algoritmi qanday ishlaydi va qanday holatlarda foydalaniladi?
Reinforcement Learningda qanday muammolar yuzaga kelishi mumkin (convergence issues)?
Q-learning algoritmi nima uchun mashhur?
Reinforcement Learningda "discount factor" (chegaralangan daraja) nima uchun foydalaniladi?
Reinforcement Learningda "Markov Decision Process" (MDP) nima?
Reinforcement Learningda "Policy Gradient" algoritmi qanday ishlaydi?
Reinforcement Learningda "Deep Q-Networks" (DQN) nima uchun mashhur?
Reinforcement Learningda "Asynchronous Advantage Actor-Critic" (A3C) algoritmi qanday ishlaydi?
Reinforcement Learningda qanday "function approximation" usullari foydalaniladi?
Reinforcement Learningning "exploration-exploitation dilemma"ga qanday hal qilish mumkin?
Reinforcement Learningda "environment", "agent" va "state" qanday qilib belgilanadi?
Reinforcement Learningda "policy" va "value function" qanday o’ zaro farq qiladi?
Reinforcement Learningda "reward function"ning ahamiyati qanday?
"Model-free" va "Model-based" Reinforcement Learning orasidagi asosiy farq nima?
Reinforcement Learningda "on-policy" va "off-policy" algoritmlar qanday farq qiladi?
Reinforcement Learningda "action space" va "observation space" nima?
Reinforcement Learningda "exploration strategies" qanday turlarda bo’ lishi mumkin?
Reinforcement Learningda "discount factor"ni qanday tanlash tavsiya etiladi?
Reinforcement Learningda "episode" va "trajectory" qanday belgilangan?
Reinforcement Learningda qanday holatlarda "function approximation" usullari foydalanilishi kerak emas?
Q-Learning nima uchun ishlatiladi?
Q-Learningda "Q-table" nima?
Q-Learningda har qanday holatda "Q-value" qanday hisoblanadi?
Q-Learningda "greedy policy" va "epsilon-greedy policy" qanday foydalaniladi?
Q-Learningda "learning rate" (o’ rganish tezligi) qanday tanlanadi?
Q-Learningda "exploration" va "exploitation" qanday amalga oshiriladi?
Q-Learningda "discount factor"ning qanday ta’ siri bor?
Q-Learningda "off-policy" va "on-policy" qanday farqlar mavjud?
Q-Learningning muhim parametrlari qanday?
Q-Learningni qanday holatlar uchun muvaffaqiyatli hisobga olish mumkin?
SARSA algoritmi nima uchun ishlatiladi?
SARSA qanday holatda qulay?
SARSAning asosiy qadam-bosqichi nimalardan iborat?
SARSAda "state-action" qanday hisoblanadi?
SARSAda "Q-value" qanday yangilashga o’ xshash hisoblanadi?
SARSAda "policy" qanday o’ rnatiladi?
SARSAning qanday "epsilon-greedy policy" usuli mavjud?
SARSAda "learning rate" (o’ rganish tezligi) qanday tanlanadi?
SARSAda "discount factor"ning qanday roli bor?
SARSA algoritmi qanday holatlar uchun eng qulay?
SARSA algoritmi va Q-learning algoritmi o’ rtasidagi asosiy farq nima?
SARSA va Q-learning algoritmlari qanday holatlar uchun eng mos?
